skill_constraints: DevOps is a single point of failure; High utilization in sprints 1 & 3.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer availability for security-critical tasks.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize critical path tasks, encourage pair programming on complex features.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and integration overhead for new contractor.
mitigation_strategies: Add a part-time DevOps contractor to accelerate infrastructure and pipeline stability, freeing up the backend team.
